quotes.quote: Aspire not to have more, but to be more.
Always aspire to become the next you, not someone else.
You aspire to great things? Begin with the little ones.
Don't aspire to make a living, aspire to make a difference.
What we aspire to be is more than what we are yet less than what we are capable of.
Those that aspire to raise their head above the crowd are most likely to have it shot off.
Aspire greatly; anything less than a commitment to excellence becomes an acceptance of mediocrity.
To never aspire to excellence means to never fully comprehend the amount of work required to achieve it.
Aspire higher to attain excellence in whatever you do. But be careful when you reach the peak, where the only way is the way downwards. Maintain your standard!
To aspire to be superhuman is a most discreditable admission that you lack the guts, the wit, the moderating judgment to be successfully and consummately human.
If you aspire to be a sparrow you will never be an eagle!
I don't aspire to be a good man. I aspire to be a whole man.
To desire is to obtain; to aspire is to achieve.
Who aspires must down as low, As high he soar'd.
Aspire rather to be a hero than merely appear one.
We do not aspire to communal life but to a life apart.
Aspire, break bounds. Endeavor to be good, and better still, best.
Aspire to be, and all that we are not God will give us credit for trying.
He who aspires to paradise should learn to deal with people with kindness.
So if you aspire to be a good conversationalist, be an attentive listener.
Aspire to do better. Instead of being the leader of the group, be the little person.
Most of us who aspire to be tops in our fields don't really consider the amount of work required to stay tops.
Sincerely to aspire after virtue, is to gain her; and zealously to labour after her wages, is to receive them.
When you're a little weird, you aspire to be normal; when you're very weird, you aspire to be recognized for it.
You must never aspire to 'finish' a house, you can merely hope to start it, and from then on it's an evolutionary process.
What we earnestly aspire to be, that in some sense we are.
To aspire for success you must first recognize the possibility of failure.
You can only aspire to what you see. That's why role modeling is important.
We should aspire to become enthusiastic and noble.
Aspire to live in peace, not in plenty.
We should not aspire for acclaim and praise from those around us, but do service only to secure the Grace of God and not for any other reward from any one.
What you aspire to on a sitcom is the feeling of live comedy.
Let us not aspire to four-year goals but rather forty-year goals.
You need not aspire for or get any new state. Get rid of your present thoughts, that is all.
If you aspire to be a leader of your own country, you must speak your own language, for God's sake.
Aspire to be who you most admire.
No matter what race or color you are, you can aspire to do something great.
If you aspire to the highest place, it is no disgrace to stop at the second, or even the third, place.
